name: Xcel Axis Flatlock 3/2mm Back Zip Full-body Wetsui - Youths
categories: Axis Flatlock 3/2mm Back Zip Full-body Wetsui
description: Make the water feel as warm as it looks. Perfect for summer and shoulder-seasons on Canadian surf breaks, this full-body wetsuit offers great stretch and comfort. Sized for teens, it has a wide back entry that's easy to get in and out of.Eco Limestone Veoprene with flatlock seam construction.3mm thick neoprene on the torso.2mm thick neoprene on the legs and arms.Duraflex knee panels.Water-tight back zipper entry.Recommended water temperature: 13-18°C.
